trans-unit.source: Provides a container for Windows toolbar objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um contêiner para objetos da barra de ferramentas do Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é a classe base para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> e suas classes associadas em novos aplicativos de formulários do Windows para criar barras de ferramentas que podem ter um Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, ou aparência e comportamento personalizados, com ou sem temas e com suporte para o estouro e reordenação de itens em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> os controles também oferecem uma experiência avançada de tempo de design que inclui a ativação no local e editar, layout personalizado e o compartilhamento de espaço horizontal ou vertical dentro de determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> classe fornece muitos membros que gerenciam a pintura e funcionalidade de arrastar e soltar e entrada do teclado e mouse.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls on a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> classe para obter mais controle e personalização sobre o estilo de pintura e layout de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles em um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os itens a seguir foram especificamente projetados para funcionar perfeitamente com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> em todas as orientações.

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control:
trans-unit.target: Eles estão disponíveis por padrão em tempo de design para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controle:

trans-unit.source: You can join <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and merge <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls with each other.
trans-unit.target: Você pode ingressar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles dentro de determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> e mesclagem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles entre si.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> rather than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> em vez de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> para aplicativos de Interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> não participará na ordem de tabulação, a menos que absolutamente é posicionado em vez de ser encaixado ou em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> class to host any other Windows Forms control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> classe para hospedar qualquer outro controle Windows Forms em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is double buffered, taking advantage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> setting.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é duplo em buffer, aproveitando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer> configuração.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> substitua e adicione funcionalidade ao controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e uso futuro, se desejado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a Windows Forms, adding items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, and adding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para formulários do Windows, adicionando itens ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e adicionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> com a matriz especificada de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />s.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled through events that you implement.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a operação do tipo "arrastar e soltar" e a reordenação de itens são manipulados por meio de eventos que você implementou.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to control drag-and-drop and item reordering through events that you implement; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para controlar a ação do tipo "arrastar e soltar" e a reordenação de itens por meio de eventos que você implementar; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> propriedade para `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> propriedade `false` responder ao comportamento de arrastar e soltar que você definiu no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> to `false` and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> para `false` e defina <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> para `true` para fazer com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> classe para lidar com arrastar e soltar e reordenar automaticamente do item.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` for two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects to allow dragging of items from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the other.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> para `true` de dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos para permitir arrastar itens de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para outro.

trans-unit.source: To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar o padrão arrastar e soltar, a tecla ALT deve ser pressionada durante a operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: Setting both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Configurar ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> para `true` lança uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a sintaxe de configuração comuns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> propriedades, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowDrop" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder" /> estão definidos como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se vários <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> e outros tipos podem ser combinados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if combining of types is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a combinação de tipos for permitida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A> property to enable multiple-document interface (MDI) children to combine their respective menus in the MDI parent.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A> propriedade para habilitar os filhos de interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI) combinar seus respectivos menus no pai MDI.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is bound and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as bordas do contêiner ao qual um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> está vinculado e determina como um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> é redimensionado com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> propriedade para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ancoragem de um controle para seu controle pai garante que as bordas ancoradas na mesma posição em relação as bordas do controle pai quando o controle pai é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas.

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Somente um pode ser definido em um momento e o último conjunto tem precedência.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle é redimensionado automaticamente para exibir todo o seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o controle se ajusta à sua largura para que o conteúdo caiba; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is embedded in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> panel, the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are not translated when you move the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a different panel of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> para `false` e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é inserido em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> painel, os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> não são convertidas quando você move o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para um painel diferente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.

trans-unit.source: To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged> event, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property, and resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Para converter os limites corretamente, sincronizar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged> eventos, verifique o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> propriedade e redimensionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> propriedades pertencem aos vários aspectos da manipulação de imagem.

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles, como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a execução de tempo – somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> configuração e o contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> configuração.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> escala ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor da tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> propriedade não dá suporte a cores transparentes, a menos que o `SupportsTransparentBackColor` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> propriedade é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controle que, se não for definido, será recuperado do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> terão o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor%2A> como seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> por padrão.

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> propriedade em uma classe derivada, use a classe base <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> propriedade para estender a implementação base.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, você deve fornecer todos os a implementação.

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> property; you can override only one if needed.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa substituir ambos os <see langword="get" /> e <see langword="set" /> acessadores do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.BackColor" /> propriedade; você pode substituir apenas um, se necessário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding context for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o contexto de associação para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> returns a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for all data-bound controls contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> retorna um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> para todos os controles de associação de dados contidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> keeps all controls that are bound to the same data source synchronized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> mantém todos os controles que estão associados à mesma fonte de dados sincronizada.

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> specifies the item in the underlying list that all data-bound controls point to.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> Especifica o item na lista subjacente que todos os controles associados a dados apontam para.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> e atribuí-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> propriedade em uma classe derivada, use a classe base <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> propriedade para estender a implementação base.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, você deve fornecer todos os a implementação.

trans-unit.source: You are not required to override both the <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> property; you can override only one, if needed.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa substituir ambos os <see langword="get" /> e <see langword="set" /> acessadores do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext" /> propriedade; você pode substituir apenas um, se necessário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be sent to an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> podem ser enviados para um menu de estouro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to send <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> items to an overflow menu; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para enviar <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> itens a um menu de estouro; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CanOverflow%2A> property to `true` to send a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> item to an overflow menu when the item's content exceeds the width of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CanOverflow%2A> propriedade `true` para enviar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> item a um menu de estouro quando o conteúdo do item excede a largura da barra de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the ToolStrip Items Collection Editor to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais itens de estouro que podem ser exibidas no formulário, use o Editor de coleção de itens de ToolStrip para gerenciar essa situação.

trans-unit.source: By default, the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are padded one pixel from the right edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to prevent the right border from painting over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> that is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> são preenchido um pixel da borda direita do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para impedir que a borda direita pintura sobre um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> que está alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as dicas de ferramenta são mostradas para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> por padrão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho padrão do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> propriedade representa o <xref:System.Drawing.Size> valor o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> quando ele é criado inicialmente.

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreferredSize%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode ajustar o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> definindo seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreferredSize%2A> o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para manter o melhor desempenho, não defina o <xref:System.Drawing.Size> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> em seu construtor.

trans-unit.source: Instead, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize" /> property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> with the preferred dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DefaultSize" /> propriedade em uma classe derivada, é preferível para retornar um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> com as dimensões preferenciais em vez de substituir todos os a implementação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the subset of items that are currently displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, including items that are automatically added into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o subconjunto de itens que são exibidos no momento no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, incluindo os itens que são adicionados automaticamente ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> representing the items that are currently displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> que representa os itens exibidos no momento no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to access only those items that are currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> propriedade para acessar somente os itens que são exibidos no momento.

trans-unit.source: These are the items that are not currently in an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: Estes são os itens que não estão atualmente em um menu de estouro.

trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> coleção para recuperar todos os itens de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.target: Recupera o retângulo de exibição atual.

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> área de layout do item.

trans-unit.target: O retângulo de exibição é a área onde você dispor itens.

trans-unit.target: A posição e as dimensões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> exibir alterações do retângulo durante a rolagem automática.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define quais bordas de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> são encaixadas em seu controle pai e determina como uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> é redimensionada com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> propriedade para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: For example, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, definindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para alinhar-se com as bordas esquerdas do controle pai e são redimensionados à medida que o controle pai for redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: Controles são encaixados em sua ordem z, que é a camada visual de controles em um formulário ao longo do eixo z do formulário (profundidade).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode ser ancorado a uma borda de seu contêiner pai, ou pode ser encaixado para todas as bordas e preencher o contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> can be repositioned within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and across <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controle está em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> podem ser reposicionados dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> e em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> property is ignored, and if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property is `false`, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> grows as items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> propriedade será ignorada e se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> é de propriedade `false`, o tamanho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> aumenta à medida que os itens são adicionados ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> não participará na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas.

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Somente um pode ser definido em um momento e o último conjunto tem precedência.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> at which to search for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> no qual pesquisar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the item located at the specified point in the client area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o item localizado no ponto especificado na área de cliente do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> at the specified location, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> no local especificado ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> não for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal coordinate, in pixels, from the left edge of the client area.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada horizontal, em pixels, da borda esquerda da área de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The vertical coordinate, in pixels, from the top edge of the client area.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada vertical, em pixels, da borda superior da área de cliente.

trans-unit.source: Returns the item located at the specified x- and y-coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> client area.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o item localizado nas coordenadas x e y especificadas da área de cliente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> located at the specified location, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> localizado no local especificado ou <see langword="null" />, se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> não for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is the reference point from which to begin the retrieval of the next item.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que é o ponto de referência no qual iniciar a recuperação do próximo item.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" /> that specifies the direction to move.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" /> que especifica a direção para a qual mover.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> from the specified reference point and moving in the specified direction.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o próximo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> do ponto de referência especificado e move-o para a direção especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that is specified by the <paramref name="start" /> parameter and is next in the order as specified by the <paramref name="direction" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> especificado pelo parâmetro <paramref name="start" /> que é o próximo na ordem especificada pelo parâmetro <paramref name="direction" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GetNextItem%2A> method to get the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GetNextItem%2A> método para obter o próximo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection> enumeration coordinates with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection> enumeração coordena com os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The specified value of the <paramref name="direction" /> parameter is not one of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado do parâmetro <paramref name="direction" /> não é um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrowDirection" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a orientação da alça de movimentação <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Horizontal" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis são <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Horizontal" /> e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle.Vertical" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space around the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaço em torno da alça de movimentação <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />, which represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />, que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A> property to get or set the space around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> move handle.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A> propriedade para obter ou definir o espaço em torno de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> alça de movimentação.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=nameWithType> can take individual values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, you can adjust the space around the move handle as preferred.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding?displayProperty=nameWithType> pode assumir valores individuais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Left%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Right%2A>, você pode ajustar o espaço ao redor da alça de movimentação como preferencial.

trans-unit.source: The margin can even be off the edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: A margem pode até mesmo ser fora da borda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a sintaxe de configuração comuns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> propriedades, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripMargin%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the boundaries of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites da alça de movimentação <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, representing the move handle boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, que representa os limites de alça de movimentação.

trans-unit.source: If the boundaries are not visible, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle" /> property returns <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: Se os limites não são visíveis, o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle" /> propriedade retorna <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle%2A> property to get boundaries for painting, hit testing, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripRectangle%2A> propriedade para obter os limites de pintura, o teste de hit e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> move handle is visible or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se a alça de movimentação <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> está visível ou oculta.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible" />.

trans-unit.source: In a stack layout, make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and ensuring that its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible>.
trans-unit.target: Em um layout de pilha, fazer um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> podem ser movidos, colocando-o um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> e garantir que seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Visible>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> has children; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> tem filhos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties" /> class, which provides basic properties for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties" /> classe, que fornece as propriedades básicas de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that contains the image displayed on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lista de imagens que contém a imagem exibida em um item <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> propriedades pertencem aos vários aspectos da manipulação de imagem.

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles, como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a execução de tempo – somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> configuração e o contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> configuração.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> escala ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in pixels, of an image used on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho, em pixels, de uma imagem usada em uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> value representing the size of the image, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o tamanho da imagem, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default is 16 x 16 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 16 x 16 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> property to control the default size of an image.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> propriedade para controlar o tamanho padrão de uma imagem.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit> to make the size of the image on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to automatically adjust to fit on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> while retaining the original image proportions.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit> para tornar o tamanho da imagem em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> para ajustar automaticamente para caber em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> enquanto mantém as proporções originais da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> propriedades pertencem aos vários aspectos da manipulação de imagem.

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controles, como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a execução de tempo – somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> configuração e o contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> configuração.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> escala ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> properties, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a sintaxe de configuração comuns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> propriedades, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user is currently moving the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> from one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> to another.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se, no momento, o usuário está movendo o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> para outro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is currently moving the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> from one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> to another; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o usuário está atualmente em movimento a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> para outro; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> é um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> controle; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um caractere é um caractere de entrada reconhecido pelo item.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o caractere precisar ser enviado diretamente para o item e não ser pré-processado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem de janela para determinar se o caractere de entrada especificado deve ser pré-processados ou enviado diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputChar%2A> método `true`, o caractere especificado é enviado diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o método retornar `false`, o caractere é pré-processados e só é enviado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> se ele não é consumido pela fase de pré-processamento.

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: O pré-processamento de um caractere inclui verificar se o caractere é um mnemônico de outro controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que exige o pré-processamento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a chave especificada for uma chave de entrada regular; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the items that belong to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens que pertencem a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />, representing all the elements contained by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />, que representa todos os elementos contidos por um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection to retrieve all the items that have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, not just the items that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> coleção para recuperar todos os itens que foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, não apenas os itens que são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: An item remains in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection even if it is an overflow item and is therefore not currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Um item permanece no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> coleção mesmo se ele é um item de estouro e, portanto, não é visível no momento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to retrieve only the items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> propriedade para recuperar apenas os itens que estão atualmente exibidos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a collection of items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma coleção de itens a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the layout of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is complete.
trans-unit.target: Ocorrerá quando o layout do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> for concluído.

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando itens não se ajustarem dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, um botão de estouro é exibida automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> propriedade determina se um item é exibido na área de excedentes sempre, conforme o necessário ou nunca.

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: Inspecione o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> evento para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, o estouro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, ou se ele não estiver sendo exibido em todos os.

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>.
trans-unit.target: As razões comuns por que um item não é exibido são que o item não se ajustou no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> propriedade foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>.

trans-unit.target: Passa uma referência para o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine" /> armazenado em cache retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> que representa o mecanismo de layout em cache retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets layout scheme characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as características do esquema de layout.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings" /> representing the layout scheme characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings" /> que representa as características de esquema de layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> lays out the items collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> dispõe a coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The possible values are <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow" />, and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow" />.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis são <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow" />, e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow" />.

trans-unit.source: The sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: A alça de dimensionamento não será exibida a menos que você defina também a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> propriedade para um dos valores de estouro.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, não será exibida a alça de dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnBeginDrag%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnBeginDrag%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnBeginDrag(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.OnBeginDrag(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
